You have a marketplace of over 2 billion people and you give Home Page Pay$ away for Free to anyone, anywhere in the world. Whenever they use the internet to do day to day activities, such as: shopping, studying using the my university or Library section (some docs even provided by Yale & Stanford Universities), playing video games, banking. Just about any activity you will get paid.

Perfect Opportunity

And you get paid to GIVE IT AWAY! Your Perfect Window of opportunity is NOW!
